revised_title: Confirmation of the Identity of Atmospheric Ozone and its Decomposition of Iodide of Potassium
tldr: The author, Thomas Andrews, investigated the identity of the body in the atmosphere that decomposes iodide of potassium. Through a series of experiments, he confirmed that this body is indeed ozone. He demonstrated this by observing the oxidation of mercury, the reaction with test-paper, and the effect of heat on the atmospheric gas. These findings support the identity of ozone in the atmosphere and its role in the decomposition of iodide of potassium.
